title: Andrew Sheets: Why Rates Will Rise Next Year, and Why the Fed Will Let Them
description: Many are skeptical of substantial rise in long term interest rates in the coming year, but we think market pressures will push them up more than the consensus and that the Fed will not get in the way. Chief Cross-Asset Strategist Andrew Sheets explains.
itunes:title: Andrew Sheets: Why Rates Will Rise Next Year, and Why the Fed Will Let Them
